org.xembly

Class Directives

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<Directive>
      • org.xembly.Directives
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Directive>, Collection<Directive>

    @Immutable
@Loggable(value=1)
public final class Directives
extends AbstractCollection<Directive>
    Collection of Directives, instantiable from String.

    For example, to fetch directives from a string and apply to the DOM document: 

    Document dom = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance()
   .newDocumentBuilder().newDocument();
 dom.appendChild(dom.createElement("root"));
 new Xembler(
   new Directives("XPATH 'root'; ADD 'employee';")
 ).exec(dom);
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
